children.name: desktop-chrome
01-pin-input.spec.ts
Create Account and Login Tests
A1, A9, A11 - Enter valid PIN redirects to Main Page
A2 - Pin should have at least 4 digits
A3 - Pin cannot have more than 8 digits
A4 - Clicking red reset button should erase any inputs made
A5 - Settings dropdown should show option to Scramble numberpad and option to stay unlocked
A6, A7 - Scramble Keypad will change the order of pin input buttons
A8 - If Stay Unlocked is toggled on, user should bypass PIN page when logging in
A12 - If incorrect pin is entered, error message should be displayed
A13 - If Stay Unlocked is toggled off, user be redirected to enter PIN when refreshing page
A14 - If Stay Unlocked is toggled on, user should be redirected to enter PIN after logging off
A15 - User can setup a custom profile picture when creating a new account
A16 - Default identicon profile image is assigned to new user if user does not setup a custom profile picture
02-friends-one-instance.spec.ts
Friends tests
H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H8 - Navigate through friends pages and validate UI elements
H10, H27, H28, H29 - Copy Button Tests
H22, H23, H24, H25 - Invalid attempts for sending friend request
03-friends-two-instances.spec.ts
Two instances tests - Friends and Chats
H15 - User should be removed from friends list after clicking unfriend
H16, H17, H18, H26 - User can be block/unblocked
H7, H20 - User can send a friend request and remote user can deny it
H21 - User can send a friend request and cancel request before other user replies to it
H6, H19, B1 to B6, B16 and B17, B35 to B37 - Friend request happy path flow and then Chats Page basic send/receive text message flow
B7, B57, B58 - Favorites tests
C11, C12, C16, C17 and C19 - Chat Sidebar tests
B49 and B56 - Chats Tests - Multiple messages testing - Scroll to bottom and Go to pin message buttons
B8 to B14 - Quick Profile Local and Remote -  Updating note
B8 to B14 - Quick Profile Local - Updating username, status, banner and profile picture
B8 to B14 - Quick Profile Remote - Updating username, status, banner and profile picture
B18 and B19, B23 to B25 - Chats Context Menu tests
B20 - Pin Messages Tests
B22 and B50 - Reaction Tests
B51 - Chats Markdowns Tests
B52 and B53 - Sending and receiving files tests
B66 - Sending and receiving emojis and emoji picker tests
B67 - Sending and receiving GIFs and gif picker tests
B68 - Sending and receiving stickers and sticker picker tests
Videocall testing between two users - mute, unmute, fullscreen, expand/collapse call
Group Chats - Create a group with 3 people and send/receive text message flow
05-chats-sidebar.spec.ts
Chats Sidebar Tests
C1 - Clicking Create Chat should open modal with option for Group Name and Group Members
C2 - Hovering over Create Chat should show tooltips
C3 - Hovering over Nav buttons should show tooltips
C4 - Clicking hamburger button should collapse sidebar
C5, C6, C7, C8, C9 - Nav bar buttons should redirect to correct page
C10 - Textbox should have highlighted border when clicking into Chat Search
07-settings-profile.spec.ts
Settings Profile Tests
I1 - Banner Picture - Tooltip displayed
I2, I3 - Banner Picture - User can upload banner
I4 - Clicking upload picture on Profile picture should open File Browser
I5 - Profile picture shows default profile picture until custom profile picture is set
I6 - Username should be displayed in the Username textbox
I7 - Clicking shortID should copy DID into clipboard
I8 - Short ID Context menu should allow to copy DID or Short ID intoto clipboard
I9, I10 - User should be able to change username and see toast notification of change
I11 - All text in Username should be selected after clicking into the text field a single time
I12 - Highlighted border should appear when clicked into the username textbox
I13 - Error message should appear if user tries to input chars that are not allowed or exceeds chars amount
I14 - Highlighted border should appear when user is clicked into Status textbox
I15, I16 - User should be able to change Status Message and see toast notification for update
I17 - All text in StatusMessage should be selected after clicking into the text field a single time
I18 - Error message should appear if user inputs chars that are not allowed or exceeds limit
I19 - Status dropdown should show Online, Offline, Idle, Do not Disturb
I20 - Status should show correctly depending on which status user has set
I21 - Clicking Reveal Phrase should display the users Recovery Phrases
I22 - Clicking copy should copy the Recovery Phrase to the users clipboard
I23 - User should be able to click checkbox to determine whether they want to store Recovery Phrase on account
I24 - Clicking LogOut should log user out of the account
09-settings-customizations.spec.ts
Settings Customization Tests
K1 - Language dropdown should display English
K2 - Font dropdown should show expected font names
K3 - Selected Fonts should be applied everywhere throughout the app
K5 - Font size should have a minimum of .82
K6, K7 - Font size should have a maximum of 1.50 and can be applied correctly everywhere through the app
K8 - Clicking the moon button should change theme of the app from Dark to Light
K9 - Themes dropdown should display Default and user can change theme from dropdown
K11 - Primary Colors should display expected values
K12 - Clicking Pick should open up the finetune color selector
K13 - Selected primary color should be applied throughout the entire app
K14 - User should be able to add additional custom CSS to the application
K15 - Emoji Font dropdown should show expected emoji font names
K16 - Selected Emoji Font should be applied everywhere throughout the app
K18 - Default Profile Picture Style dropdown should show expected default profile picture styles
K19 - Default Profile Picture Style selected should be applied correctly in the app
10-settings-messages.spec.ts
Settings Messages Tests
L1 - User should be able to toggle on and off emoji conversion
L2 - User should be able to toggle on and off Markdown support
L3 - User should be able to toggle on and off emoji Spam/Bot detection & rejection
11-settings-audio-video.spec.ts
Settings Audio and Video Tests
M1 and M2 - Input dropdown and input volume indicator should display
M3 and M4 - Output device dropdown and output volume indicator should display
M5 - User should be able to toggle on and off Echo Cancellation
M6 - User should be able to toggle on and off Interface Sounds
M7 - User should be able to toggle on and off Control Sounds
M8 - User should be able to toggle on and off Message Sounds
M9 - User should be able to toggle on and off Call Timer
M10 - User should be able to test video device
12-settings-extensions.spec.ts
Settings Extensions Tests
N1 - User should land on Installed when navigating to this page
13-settings-keybinds.spec.ts
Settings Keybinds Tests
O1, 06 - Message at top of page and custom keybinds listed correctly
O2, 04 - Clicking a key should activate the Recorded Keys - User can save keybind
O3 - Action dropdown should display correct keybind actions
O5 - Clicking Cancel should cancel any custom keybinding the user was trying to add
O7 - Highlighted border should display when user clicks cancel
O8 - Clicking Revert Keybindings should revert any custom keybindings the user has saved
O9 - Highlighted border should be displayed when clicking Revert Keybindings
O10 - Clicking the backwards arrow should revert specific custom keybinding
15-settings-accessibility.spec.ts
Settings Accessibility Tests
P1, P2 - User should be able to toggle on/off Dyslexic mode and changes are applied everywhere
16-settings-notifications.spec.ts
Settings Notifications Tests
Q1 - User should be able to toggle on/off Notifications
Q2 - User should be able to toggle on/off Friend Request Notifications
Q3 - User should be able to toggle on/off Message Notifications
Q4 - User should be able to toggle on/off Settings Notifications
18-settings-about.spec.ts
Settings About Tests
R1 - "About Uplink" should appear at top of page
R2 - Current version of Uplink should be displayed
R4 - Clicking Open Website should take you to the Uplink website
R5 - Clicking Open Source Code should take you to the source code
R6 and R7 - Made In header text, description and flags displayed
R8 - Clicking DevMode button 10 times should enable DevMode
19-settings-licenses.spec.ts
Settings Licenses Tests
S1 - Clicking View License should take user to our licenses page
20-settings-developer.spec.ts
Settings Developer Tests
T1, T2 - Clicking Exit Devmode should exit user out of Devmode
T3 - Clicking Load MockData should load all mock data throughout app
T4 - Clicking Clear State should clear users state
T5 - Highlighted border should appear around Exit DevMode when clicked
T6 - Highlighted border should appear around Load MockData when clicked
T7 - Highlighted border should appear around Clear State when clicked
T8 - Clicking Test Voice State should open debug voice page
24-files.spec.ts
Files Page Tests
F3, F4 - Amount of Free and Total should appear in Toolbar
F5 - Highlighted border should appaer when you click Create New Folder
F6, F11 -Clicking Upload should then open up the OS files browser and user can upload files in root folder
F7 - User can create new folders on root
F8 - If user tries to create a folder with empty name or press Esc while name input is displayed, folder is not created
F9 - User cannot create directories with existing name - Toast notification is shown
F10 - User can create subfolders and navigate to parent folder with go back button
F12 - User can upload files in subfolder folder
F13 - Files and folders are still visible after logging out and login again
F14 - If user upload the same file again, file is uploaded but with different filename
